content.text: I'll help you create a simple hello world script. Let me use the Task tool to handle this request.

input.prompt:
Create a simple "Hello, World!" script. Please:

1. Choose an appropriate programming language (JavaScript/TypeScript would be good given this is a Node.js project)
2. Create the script file in an appropriate location
3. Make sure the script can be executed
4. Test that it works by running it

The script should simply output "Hello, World!" when executed. Please write the code and verify it works.

content.text:
I see the permission request is pending. Once you approve it, I'll:
1. Create the script file
2. Make it executable with chmod
3. Test it by running it

The script will be created at `/Users/luke/dev/caret/caret-scripts/hello-world.js` which is the appropriate location for Caret automation scripts according to the project structure.
